name: Cursed Gods
description:
Cursed Gods is a 2D pixel art jump'n'run game following the main character Katara on her quest to save her beloved Isaacos. In this prototype you help Katara find her way trhough a deserted canyon to find the tower of hades, in the hope the god of death and illness can Isaacos.

Controls:
[Enter] On Start Screen to start Game, to lock in the attack in Fight Screen and to Restart after death
[A/D] Move left/right
[Space] Jump
[I] Inventory
[E] Interact

You can leave the game using the inventory.
